1.content: First thing's first: When will the adventure take place? Please note that the text in perenthesis is some of the highlights throught the season. Please try to make each "Epsoide" last about 4 or 5 chapters.
1.title: Choices, Choices, Choices

15.content: Before Voyager's mission to the badlands? or after they get home?
15.title: When?

info.brief_description: Not all of Voyager's adventures were made into episodes.
info.description:
Not all of Voyager's adventures were made into epsoides. There were plenty of exiting and epic adventures between the epsoides. These are the untold stories of Star Trek: Voyager.

Please note that I take no credit in the show itself. I created this story just for fun.

So enjoy what the creative minds of Star Trek fans come up with, and maybe make an addition your self.
info.pretty_title: Star Trek Voyager: the Untold Stories
